attributes.action: Make MHRA Yellow Card reporting mandatory for all medical professionals
attributes.additional_details:
All yellow card reports must also be sent to the responsible pharmaceutical company immediately.  
 
This will ensure that medical professionals have a responsibility to report, with appropriate sanctions if they fail to do so. It should increase reporting and help improve patient safety and confidence.
attributes.background: The Government should make the MHRA’s Yellow Card reporting system mandatory for medical professionals to complete whenever they identify or are made aware of an adverse reaction.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
